data.title: [Members of the 56th Armored Infantry Battalion]
meta_keywords: Military and War - Wars - World War II
data.meta_description: Photograph of members of the second platoon of the 56th Armored Infantry Battalion standing in front of a plywood hutment and posing. Four of the men are standing behind two kneeling men. The men in the back are Ed Sutkaitis, Frank Hulsizer, Howie Toms, and Curt Hagen. The men in the front row are Bill Shor and John Nugent. Most of them are wearing U.S. Army uniforms, but Sutkaitis is wearing a Camp Campbell tee shirt and Toms wears no shirt at all.
data.text:
Photograph of members of the second platoon of the 56th Armored Infantry Battalion standing in front of a plywood hutment and posing. Four of the men are standing behind two kneeling men. The men in the back are Ed Sutkaitis, Frank Hulsizer, Howie Toms, and Curt Hagen. The men in the front row are Bill Shor and John Nugent. Most of them are wearing U.S. Army uniforms, but Sutkaitis is wearing a Camp Campbell tee shirt and Toms wears no shirt at all.

Photograph of members of the second platoon of the 56th Armored Infantry Battalion standing in front of a plywood hutment and posing. Four of the men are standing behind two kneeling men. The men in the back are Ed Sutkaitis, Frank Hulsizer, Howie Toms, and Curt Hagen. The men in the front row are Bill Shor and John Nugent. Most of them are wearing U.S. Army uniforms, but Sutkaitis is wearing a Camp Campbell tee shirt and Toms wears no shirt at all.
